bibl.title: Callimachus: Hecale. Edited with Introduction and Commentary.
bibl.seg: HOLLIS A.S., Callimachus: Hecale. Edited with Introduction and Commentary.
Oxford, Clarendon Press, 1990, 8°, xii-401 pp., 1 fig. £48.

C.R. par W. Geoffrey Arnott, LCM 17 (1992) pp. 27-31. - Adelmo Barigazzi, Gnomon 64 (1992) pp. 196-200. - James J. Clauss, BMCRev 2 (1991) pp. 134-139. - Daniel Donnet, AntCl 61 (1992) pp. 352-353 et EtCl 60 (1992) p. 374. - José Guillermo Montes Cala, Habis 23 (1992) pp. 351-353. - Frederick Williams, CR N.S., 44 (1994) pp. 16-18. - James E.G. Zetzel, CP 87 (1992) pp. 167-169. - Jerry Clack, CW 85 (1991-1992) pp. 119-120.
